title: Symptoms Of Covid-19
content:
Some nucleic acid amplification tests (NAATs), including PCR tests, can differentiate between flu and COVID-19 at the same time. If one of these tests is not available, many
testing locations
provide flu and COVID-19 tests separately.
Keep Reading:
Similarities and Differences between Flu and COVID-19
